name: 2006 FIFA World Cup
description: Play with your heroes and take part in the 2006 FIFA World Cup™. Lead your nation from the qualification rounds all the way to the FIFA World Cup Finals in Germany. You'll experience a full range of emotions along the way - from the elation of beating rival nations to the despair of having your FIFA World Cup dreams shattered in a crucial penalty shootout. This is your ticket to all the pageantry and passion of the greatest show on Earth.
